revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Meru Networks |model=AP1020 |revision=i |upc= |ean= |asin=B008GTFGHY |price= |est_release_date=10/2010 |fcc_date=10/01/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=USI |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=access point |fcc_id=RE7-AP1020 |ic_id=6749A-AP1020 |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp=0.3 |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4748A1 |cpu1_cspeed=533 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL128P90TFIR2 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162FFR-Y5C |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe,USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4748A1 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Broadcom BCM94342EMC |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4342E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM5481A2 |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=2.4/5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SE2548A;;2; |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Dual Radio Access Point AP1000}}
The FCC test report notes the manufacturer as [[USI]] [''United Scientific Industrial (Shanghai)''].
The FCC manual (installation guide) seems to indicate the AP1000 and AP300 SSIDs are ''Meru''.
"MERU [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mount_Tamalpais Mount Tam]" and "DVT2.1" is silkscreened on the main board. *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/files/Broadcom/BCM4748.pdf BCM4748] [[MIPS 74K]] WiSoC (2x2 802.11bgn) *"200-117166-0010G A", the ''BRCM'' logo, "BCM94342EMC", :and "LOG_M11" is silkscreened on the wireless module. *[[Broadcom BCM94342EMC]] - [http://www.broadcom.com/collateral/pb/4748-PB00-R.pdf BCM4342E] (MAC/PHY/Radio) :802.11n 2 Stream Enterprise PCIe Module Full Mini Card *Both radios are using two [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=946 ''Skyworks'' (''SiGe'') SE2548A] :([[Skyworks]] SE2548A Dual Band 802.11n FEMs)
